info.name: 2. WFX-QA-E2E-Regression
info.description:
*   Authentications
    *   SA, Admin, User
    *   SSO user accounts
*   Organization Search, Update
*   User tests
    *   New User, make admin, update details, login & reset password
    *   Set user permissions, preferences, document settings
    *   Create user tests
*   Roles & Places
*   UserLists
*   Attributes
*   User Roles
*   Workflows
*   Hashtags
*   Broadcasts
*   Fokoud checks
*   Create basic task
